page.title: 16ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: Popular annual events held in the village each year include{The Coverack {Regatta, Lifeboat Day and Carnival {Day.}The{regatta}is centred on the harbour and includes such events as boat races, swimming and diving, for each of which trophies or prizes are awarded. Crews and teams from other villages compete in the events, together with local people and holidaymakers. {Lifeboat Day}generates a great deal of support, when funds are raised for the Royal National Lifeboat Institution; a charity close to the peoples' hearts, although Coverack's own lifeboat has been taken from the village. Much planning and preparation of decorated floats takes place for {Carnival Day.}The Carnival Queen is crowned and a procession of floats parade through the village
